use_case: Creating a complete sales funnel blueprint for a new product launch
prompt:
Design a comprehensive 5-stage sales funnel for [product/service] targeting [audience]. Include:
1. Awareness stage: Content strategy and channels
2. Interest stage: Lead magnets and engagement tactics
3. Consideration stage: Nurturing sequences and value propositions
4. Decision stage: Conversion triggers and offers
5. Retention stage: Loyalty programs and upsell strategies

For each stage, provide specific tactics, recommended tools, key metrics to track, and estimated conversion rates. Make it scalable and focused on building trust.
description: Generates a complete funnel architecture with stage-specific strategies. Best for planning new funnels or redesigning existing ones. Ensures comprehensive coverage of customer journey with actionable tactics for each stage.

use_case: Implementing AI-powered personalization across funnel stages
prompt:
Create a hyper-personalization strategy for my sales funnel that:
- Segments users based on [behavioral data/demographics/psychographics]
- Delivers dynamic content based on user intent signals
- Implements predictive analytics for user behavior
- Personalizes email sequences and web experiences
- Uses real-time data to adjust offers and messaging

Provide specific AI tools for each personalization tactic, implementation steps, and expected conversion rate improvements. Target audience: [describe audience].
description: Develops a comprehensive personalization framework using AI. Increases conversion rates by 20-50% through targeted experiences. Best combined with CRM integration and behavioral tracking tools.

use_case: Designing an irresistible lead magnet for top-of-funnel lead capture
prompt:
I need to create a high-converting lead magnet for [niche/audience] who struggle with [specific problem]. Design a [ebook/checklist/quiz/toolkit] that:
- Provides immediate, actionable value
- Addresses the core pain point: [problem]
- Positions my solution as the next logical step
- Is scannable and easy to consume
- Includes compelling visuals and examples

Provide a detailed outline with chapter/section titles, key points for each section, visual suggestions, and a persuasive title under 10 words. Include opt-in page copy and post-download nurturing email sequence.
description: Creates complete lead magnet with supporting materials. Focuses on value delivery and conversion optimization. Best for building email lists and establishing authority in the awareness stage.

use_case: Creating landing page copy that converts cold traffic
prompt:
Write conversion-optimized landing page copy for [product/service] targeting [audience] with [specific pain point]. Structure:

1. Headline: Attention-grabbing promise (under 12 words)
2. Subheadline: Clarify the transformation
3. Hero section: Emotional hook and credibility
4. Problem agitation: 3-5 specific pain points
5. Solution presentation: How you solve it uniquely
6. Features & benefits: 5-7 key points
7. Social proof: Testimonial framework
8. Risk reversal: Guarantee language
9. CTA: Primary and secondary calls-to-action
10. Urgency/scarcity elements

Use conversational tone, power words, and ensure mobile-readability. Include A/B testing suggestions for key elements.
description: Generates complete landing page copy following proven conversion frameworks. Incorporates psychological triggers and persuasion principles. Ideal for PPC campaigns, product launches, and lead generation pages.

use_case: Developing an automated email nurture sequence for leads
prompt:
Create a 7-email nurture sequence for [product/service] targeting [audience segment]. Each email should:

Email 1 (Day 0): Welcome & deliver lead magnet + set expectations
Email 2 (Day 2): Educational content addressing [pain point 1]
Email 3 (Day 4): Case study/success story with social proof
Email 4 (Day 6): Educational content addressing [pain point 2]
Email 5 (Day 9): Product/service introduction with unique value proposition
Email 6 (Day 12): Objection handling + FAQ
Email 7 (Day 15): Strong CTA with urgency/bonus

For each email provide: Subject line (with A/B variant), preview text, body copy, CTA, and P.S. Include personalization tokens and segmentation triggers for optimization.
description: Creates a complete automated nurture sequence with timing strategy. Balances education and promotion for optimal engagement. Best for warming cold leads and moving them through the funnel systematically.

use_case: Optimizing CTAs for maximum click-through rates
prompt:
Design 10 high-converting CTA variations for [specific funnel stage] targeting [audience]. For each CTA provide:
- Button text (action-oriented, under 5 words)
- Supporting microcopy (value statement)
- Visual design suggestions (color, size, placement)
- Contextual triggers (when/where to show)
- A/B test hypothesis

Include CTAs for different user intent levels (high, medium, low) and different devices (desktop, mobile). Focus on reducing friction and increasing urgency. Provide psychological reasoning for each variation.
description: Generates diverse CTA options optimized for different scenarios and user psychology. Includes testing framework for continuous optimization. Best for improving conversion rates at critical decision points.

use_case: Building trust through social proof elements
prompt:
Design a comprehensive social proof strategy for [product/service] funnel including:

1. Testimonial framework:
   - Structure for collecting high-impact testimonials
   - 5 testimonial templates for different objections
   - Placement strategy across funnel stages

2. Trust badges and certifications:
   - Relevant industry credentials to display
   - Security and guarantee seals
   - Media mentions and awards

3. Real-time social proof:
   - Live visitor/purchase notifications
   - User-generated content displays
   - Review aggregation and display

4. Case studies:
   - 3 detailed case study outlines
   - Measurable results and ROI focus

Provide implementation code snippets and design mockups for each element. Prioritize by impact on conversion rates.
description: Creates a multi-layered trust-building framework that addresses different trust barriers. Combines static and dynamic social proof for maximum credibility. Essential for increasing conversion rates across all funnel stages.

use_case: Setting up A/B testing framework for funnel optimization
prompt:
Create a comprehensive A/B testing strategy for [specific funnel element] with:

1. Hypothesis framework:
   - Current performance baseline: [metrics]
   - Proposed changes and rationale
   - Expected impact and minimum detectable effect

2. Test variations:
   - Control version description
   - 3-5 challenger variations with specific changes
   - Prioritization based on potential impact

3. Testing parameters:
   - Sample size calculation
   - Test duration and traffic allocation
   - Success metrics and statistical significance threshold

4. Implementation plan:
   - Technical setup requirements
   - Tool recommendations (free and paid)
   - Monitoring and iteration strategy

Provide code examples for implementation and analysis dashboards. Include common pitfalls to avoid.
description: Establishes a scientific testing framework for continuous funnel improvement. Includes statistical rigor and practical implementation guidance. Best for data-driven optimization of any funnel element.

use_case: Designing mobile-first funnel experience
prompt:
Optimize my sales funnel for mobile users visiting from [traffic source]. Address:

1. Mobile UX improvements:
   - Touch-friendly navigation and buttons (minimum 44x44px)
   - Simplified forms with smart defaults
   - Progressive disclosure for complex information
   - Thumb-zone optimized layouts

2. Page speed optimization:
   - Image compression and lazy loading strategies
   - Critical CSS and above-the-fold optimization
   - Minimize HTTP requests

3. Mobile-specific content:
   - Scannable copy with short paragraphs
   - Click-to-call and map integration
   - Mobile-optimized CTAs

4. Technical implementation:
   - Responsive design breakpoints
   - Mobile-first CSS framework
   - Performance testing checklist

Provide code snippets and mobile preview mockups. Target: <3 second load time, >50% mobile conversion rate.
description: Creates a mobile-optimized funnel that converts effectively on smaller screens. Addresses technical and UX considerations for mobile users. Critical as mobile traffic often exceeds 60% of total visitors.

use_case: Implementing urgency and scarcity tactics ethically
prompt:
Design ethical urgency and scarcity mechanisms for [offer/product] that increase conversions without manipulating users:

1. Time-based urgency:
   - Limited-time offer copy templates
   - Countdown timer implementations (code)
   - Deadline communication strategy

2. Quantity scarcity:
   - Stock level displays
   - Limited availability messaging
   - Waitlist strategies

3. Social proof urgency:
   - 'Others are viewing' notifications
   - Recent purchase popups
   - Trending product indicators

4. FOMO triggers:
   - Bonus expiration notices
   - Early-bird pricing tiers
   - Exclusive access frameworks

Ensure all tactics are genuine and transparent. Provide A/B testing framework to measure impact. Include psychological principles behind each tactic.
description: Creates urgency mechanisms that drive action while maintaining ethical standards. Balances persuasion with transparency. Can increase conversion rates by 15-30% when implemented correctly.

use_case: Building analytics dashboard for funnel performance tracking
prompt:
Create a comprehensive analytics tracking system for [sales funnel] with:

1. Key metrics to track:
   - Funnel stage conversion rates
   - Average time in each stage
   - Drop-off points and abandonment rates
   - Traffic source performance
   - Customer acquisition cost by channel
   - Lifetime value projections

2. Dashboard design:
   - Real-time monitoring widgets
   - Trend analysis charts
   - Alert systems for anomalies
   - Cohort analysis views

3. Implementation:
   - Google Analytics 4 setup guide
   - Custom event tracking code
   - UTM parameter strategy
   - Heatmap and session recording tools

4. Reporting:
   - Weekly performance report template
   - Monthly optimization recommendations
   - Quarterly strategic review format

Provide code snippets for tracking implementation and dashboard creation. Include sample SQL queries for advanced analysis.
description: Establishes comprehensive tracking and reporting for data-driven funnel optimization. Provides visibility into performance at every stage. Essential for identifying opportunities and measuring ROI.

use_case: Creating retargeting campaign for funnel drop-offs
prompt:
Design a multi-channel retargeting strategy for users who dropped off at [funnel stage]. Include:

1. Segmentation:
   - Define audience segments based on behavior
   - Create custom audiences for each drop-off point
   - Prioritize by likelihood to convert

2. Campaign structure:
   - Facebook/Instagram ad sequences (3-5 ads)
   - Google Display Network remarketing
   - Email win-back campaigns
   - SMS retargeting (if applicable)

3. Creative strategy:
   - Ad copy addressing specific objections
   - Visual concepts and formats
   - Offer/incentive recommendations
   - Frequency and timing guidelines

4. Technical setup:
   - Pixel implementation code
   - Audience creation steps
   - Budget allocation recommendations
   - Success metrics and optimization triggers

Provide campaign examples for 3 different drop-off scenarios. Include cost projections and ROI targets.
description: Creates targeted campaigns to recover lost prospects at various funnel stages. Addresses specific objections and provides incentives for return. Can recover 15-30% of abandoned conversions.

use_case: Developing interactive quiz funnel for product recommendations
prompt:
Create an interactive quiz funnel for [product category] that:

1. Quiz structure:
   - 5-10 engaging questions that segment users
   - Question types: multiple choice, image selection, slider scales
   - Logic branching based on answers
   - Personality/product match algorithm

2. Personalized results:
   - Custom product recommendations
   - Explanation of why products match
   - Social sharing capabilities
   - Email capture for detailed results

3. Implementation:
   - Quiz builder tool recommendations
   - Code structure for custom builds
   - Design mockups and user flow
   - Mobile optimization considerations

4. Conversion optimization:
   - Progress indicators
   - Compelling result page with CTAs
   - Follow-up email sequence
   - Retargeting strategy for quiz takers

Provide complete quiz copy, result templates, and technical implementation guide. Target: 40%+ quiz completion rate.
description: Creates engaging interactive experience that qualifies leads while collecting data. Quizzes typically have 30-50% higher engagement than static forms. Excellent for personalized product recommendations.

use_case: Optimizing checkout process to reduce cart abandonment
prompt:
Redesign the checkout/signup flow for [product/service] to minimize friction and maximize completions:

1. Flow optimization:
   - Reduce form fields to absolute minimum
   - Implement autofill and smart validation
   - Add progress indicator for multi-step forms
   - Enable guest checkout option
   - Optimize payment gateway integration

2. Trust elements:
   - Security badges and SSL indicators
   - Money-back guarantee prominence
   - Clear pricing and no hidden fees
   - Customer support visibility

3. Mobile optimization:
   - One-column layouts
   - Large input fields and buttons
   - Native mobile payment options (Apple Pay, Google Pay)
   - Minimal typing required

4. Abandonment prevention:
   - Exit-intent popups with offers
   - Cart abandonment email sequence
   - SMS recovery campaigns
   - Retargeting ad strategy

Provide wireframes, code examples, and before/after conversion projections. Target: <10% abandonment rate.
description: Streamlines the final conversion step to reduce abandonment. Focuses on removing friction and building trust. Can increase completion rates by 20-40% with proper optimization.

use_case: Creating value ladder funnel with multiple product tiers
prompt:
Design a value ladder funnel for [business type] with multiple offers at increasing price points:

1. Funnel structure:
   - Free lead magnet (entry point)
   - Tripwire offer: $7-27 (commitment device)
   - Core offer: $47-197 (main product)
   - Upsell 1: $197-497 (enhanced version)
   - Upsell 2: $497-997 (premium/done-for-you)
   - Continuity: $X/month (recurring revenue)

2. Offer positioning:
   - Unique value proposition for each tier
   - Logical progression and relationship between offers
   - Pricing psychology and anchoring strategies

3. Implementation:
   - Sales page templates for each offer
   - Order bump strategies
   - One-click upsell sequences
   - Downsell fallback offers

4. Automation:
   - Email sequences between tiers
   - Behavioral triggers for upgrade offers
   - Segmentation based on purchase history

Provide complete funnel map, offer descriptions, and projected average order value calculations.
description: Creates multi-tier funnel that maximizes customer lifetime value. Uses psychological pricing and logical progression. Can increase average order value by 2-5x compared to single-product funnels.

use_case: Implementing chatbot for automated lead qualification
prompt:
Design an AI chatbot conversation flow for [business type] that qualifies leads and books appointments:

1. Conversation structure:
   - Welcoming greeting and value proposition
   - Qualifying questions sequence (5-7 questions)
   - Pain point identification
   - Budget/timeline qualification
   - Next step recommendation

2. Branching logic:
   - Qualified lead → Book appointment
   - Unqualified lead → Nurture sequence
   - Hot lead → Immediate call option
   - Needs more info → Resource library

3. Personality and tone:
   - Brand voice guidelines
   - Response templates for common scenarios
   - Empathy and relationship-building phrases
   - Handling objections and FAQs

4. Technical implementation:
   - Platform recommendations (ManyChat, Drift, custom)
   - Integration with CRM and calendar
   - Lead scoring and routing rules
   - Handoff to human agents protocol

Provide complete conversation scripts, flowcharts, and performance metrics to track. Target: 30%+ lead qualification rate.
description: Automates initial lead qualification 24/7 while maintaining personalized experience. Frees up sales team for high-value conversations. Can handle 80%+ of initial inquiries without human intervention.

use_case: Designing webinar funnel for high-ticket sales
prompt:
Create a complete webinar funnel for [high-ticket offer $1000+] including:

1. Pre-webinar sequence:
   - Registration page copy and design
   - Confirmation email with value building
   - Reminder sequence (3 days, 1 day, 1 hour, 15 min)
   - Pre-webinar content to increase show-up rate

2. Webinar structure:
   - Hook and introduction (5 min)
   - Origin story and credibility (10 min)
   - Content delivery (30-40 min teaching)
   - Transition to pitch (5 min)
   - Offer presentation (15-20 min)
   - Q&A and close (10 min)

3. Post-webinar sequence:
   - Replay availability strategy
   - Application/booking emails
   - Scarcity and urgency messaging
   - Follow-up call scheduling

4. Technical setup:
   - Platform recommendations (Zoom, Demio, etc.)
   - Slide deck templates
   - Chat engagement strategies
   - Conversion tracking setup

Provide complete scripts, email sequences, and conversion optimization tactics. Target: 5-15% conversion to high-ticket offer.
description: Creates comprehensive webinar funnel for selling premium offers. Includes all touchpoints from registration to sale. Effective for building trust and demonstrating value before asking for significant commitment.

use_case: Building viral referral loop into existing funnel
prompt:
Design a referral program for [product/service] that creates viral growth:

1. Incentive structure:
   - Reward for referrer (discount, cash, points)
   - Reward for referee (welcome bonus)
   - Tier system for multiple referrals
   - Special rewards for high-value referrers

2. Mechanics:
   - Unique referral link generation
   - Easy sharing options (email, social, SMS)
   - Tracking and attribution system
   - Automated reward fulfillment

3. Promotional strategy:
   - In-app/website referral prompts
   - Email campaigns encouraging sharing
   - Post-purchase referral requests
   - Gamification elements (leaderboards, badges)

4. Technical implementation:
   - Referral tracking code
   - Dashboard for users to track referrals
   - Integration with existing funnel
   - Anti-fraud measures

Provide code examples, promotional copy templates, and viral coefficient calculations. Target: 1.5+ viral coefficient (each user brings 1.5 new users).
description: Creates self-perpetuating growth engine through customer referrals. Reduces customer acquisition costs while increasing trust through word-of-mouth. Can contribute 20-40% of new customer acquisition.

use_case: Optimizing funnel for different traffic temperatures
prompt:
Create customized funnel experiences for different audience temperatures:

1. Cold traffic (unaware):
   - Educational content-first approach
   - Longer nurture sequences
   - Low-commitment first offers
   - Trust-building emphasis

2. Warm traffic (problem-aware):
   - Solution-focused messaging
   - Comparison and alternatives content
   - Social proof prominence
   - Mid-level engagement asks

3. Hot traffic (solution-aware):
   - Direct offer presentation
   - Strong CTAs and urgency
   - Streamlined path to purchase
   - Immediate value demonstration

4. Implementation:
   - URL parameter tracking for source
   - Dynamic content based on referrer
   - Segmented email sequences
   - Ad creative variations

For each temperature, provide: Landing page structure, headline formulas, offer positioning, and expected conversion rates. Include code for dynamic content switching.
description: Matches funnel experience to visitor awareness level for maximum relevance. Dramatically improves conversion rates by meeting users where they are. Essential for multi-channel marketing campaigns.

use_case: Creating micro-commitment funnel for complex products
prompt:
Design a micro-commitment funnel for [complex/high-consideration product] that builds trust gradually:

1. Commitment ladder:
   - Level 1: Content consumption (blog read, video watch)
   - Level 2: Lead magnet download (email capture)
   - Level 3: Tool/calculator usage (engagement)
   - Level 4: Quiz/assessment completion (qualification)
   - Level 5: Free trial/demo signup
   - Level 6: Purchase decision

2. Psychology:
   - Consistency principle application
   - Progressive profiling strategy
   - Value delivery at each step
   - Trust-building sequence

3. Content for each stage:
   - Educational assets
   - Interactive tools
   - Case studies and proof
   - Trial/demo materials

4. Automation:
   - Behavioral email triggers
   - Scoring and segmentation
   - Sales-ready notification system
   - Nurture paths for non-advancing leads

Provide complete funnel map, content outlines, and automation rules. Target: 60%+ progression through stages.
description: Reduces resistance to high-commitment decisions through series of smaller commitments. Particularly effective for complex, expensive, or unfamiliar products. Increases final conversion by 40-60%.

use_case: Implementing exit-intent optimization strategies
prompt:
Create a comprehensive exit-intent strategy to recover abandoning visitors:

1. Exit-intent popup variations:
   - Discount offer popup (with urgency)
   - Lead magnet offer (value-first)
   - Survey popup (objection discovery)
   - Content recommendation (engagement)
   - Chat invitation (support offer)

2. Segmentation:
   - First-time vs returning visitors
   - Time on site (engaged vs bounce)
   - Pages visited (interest level)
   - Cart value (for e-commerce)

3. Copywriting:
   - Attention-grabbing headlines
   - Value propositions
   - Urgency and scarcity language
   - Clear CTA copy
   - Easy dismissal option

4. Technical implementation:
   - Exit-intent detection code
   - Display frequency rules
   - Mobile optimization
   - A/B testing framework
   - Performance tracking

Provide popup copy variations, design mockups, and code snippets. Include ethical considerations and best practices. Target: 10-15% conversion of exit-intent visitors.
description: Captures leaving visitors before they abandon the funnel. Provides last-chance conversion opportunity. Can recover 10-15% of abandoning traffic when implemented strategically.

use_case: Building community-driven funnel for brand loyalty
prompt:
Design a community-centric funnel that builds brand loyalty and reduces churn:

1. Community structure:
   - Onboarding to community (post-purchase)
   - Engagement mechanisms (discussions, events)
   - Gamification and rewards
   - User-generated content encouragement

2. Integration with funnel:
   - Community as retention tool
   - Member referral incentives
   - Exclusive community offers
   - Early access and beta testing

3. Platform strategy:
   - Platform selection (Facebook Group, Discord, Circle, custom)
   - Moderation and management plan
   - Content calendar for community
   - Success metrics and KPIs

4. Monetization:
   - Premium community tiers
   - Community-exclusive products
   - Upsell opportunities within community
   - Advocacy and ambassador programs

Provide community guidelines, engagement strategies, and funnel integration points. Target: 30%+ increase in customer lifetime value.
description: Creates engaged community that drives retention, referrals, and repeat purchases. Transforms customers into brand advocates. Reduces churn by 25-40% and increases LTV significantly.

use_case: Optimizing for voice search and conversational commerce
prompt:
Adapt my sales funnel for voice search and conversational commerce:

1. Voice search optimization:
   - Natural language keyword targeting
   - FAQ content optimization
   - Featured snippet strategies
   - Local SEO for voice queries

2. Conversational commerce:
   - Voice-activated ordering
   - Smart speaker integration
   - Conversational AI for recommendations
   - Voice authentication for returning customers

3. Content adaptation:
   - Conversational tone and structure
   - Question-based content organization
   - Simplified navigation for voice
   - Audio content strategy

4. Technical implementation:
   - Schema markup for voice results
   - Voice app development (Alexa Skills, Google Actions)
   - API integrations
   - Testing and optimization

Provide optimization checklist, content templates, and implementation guide. Include future-proofing strategies as voice commerce grows.
description: Prepares funnel for voice-first interactions and smart speaker commerce. Positions business for emerging channel that's growing 35% annually. Essential for staying competitive as voice commerce expands.

use_case: Creating video funnel with interactive elements
prompt:
Design a video-centric sales funnel with interactive elements:

1. Video strategy:
   - Awareness: Educational/entertaining videos (1-3 min)
   - Interest: Product demo/explainer videos (3-5 min)
   - Consideration: Case study/testimonial videos (2-4 min)
   - Decision: Personalized video messages

2. Interactive elements:
   - Clickable CTAs within videos
   - Branching video paths based on choices
   - Lead capture forms at key moments
   - Quizzes and assessments in video

3. Personalization:
   - Dynamic video content based on viewer data
   - Personalized thumbnails and titles
   - Customized video messaging
   - Automated video follow-ups

4. Technical implementation:
   - Interactive video platform selection (Wistia, Vidyard)
   - Hosting and delivery optimization
   - Analytics and engagement tracking
   - Integration with email and CRM

Provide video scripts, interactive element suggestions, and technical setup guide. Target: 2-3x engagement vs static content.
description: Leverages video's high engagement rates with interactive conversion elements. Videos can increase conversion by 80%+ when interactive elements are added. Ideal for visual products and complex explanations.

use_case: Implementing progressive profiling in multi-step forms
prompt:
Design a progressive profiling strategy for [sales funnel] that collects user data gradually:

1. Data collection strategy:
   - Stage 1: Essential data only (name, email)
   - Stage 2: Qualification data (company, role)
   - Stage 3: Preference data (interests, goals)
   - Stage 4: Behavioral data (actions, engagement)

2. Form optimization:
   - Multi-step form design
   - Progress indicators
   - Save and return functionality
   - Smart field visibility rules

3. Timing and triggers:
   - When to ask for each data point
   - Behavioral triggers for additional questions
   - Value exchange for data sharing
   - Balance between data collection and friction

4. Technical implementation:
   - Form builder tool selection
   - CRM integration for data enrichment
   - Cookie-based returning user detection
   - Data security and privacy compliance

Provide form structures, field prioritization, and code examples. Target: 40%+ higher completion rates than single-step forms.
description: Reduces form abandonment by collecting data over time rather than all at once. Respects user privacy while building complete profiles. Can increase form completion by 40-60%.

use_case: Designing subscription box funnel with retention focus
prompt:
Create a subscription funnel for [product category] optimized for retention:

1. Acquisition funnel:
   - Quiz for personalization
   - Trial offer structure
   - Onboarding sequence
   - First box experience optimization

2. Retention strategies:
   - Skip/pause options to reduce churn
   - Customization and flexibility
   - Surprise and delight elements
   - Regular communication and engagement

3. Monetization:
   - Upsell opportunities (add-ons, upgrades)
   - Gift subscriptions
   - Referral incentives
   - Annual plan conversions

4. Churn prevention:
   - At-risk customer identification
   - Win-back campaigns
   - Cancellation flow optimization (save offers)
   - Feedback collection and action

Provide complete funnel documentation, email sequences, and retention playbook. Target: <5% monthly churn rate.
description: Builds sustainable subscription business with focus on long-term retention. Addresses unique challenges of recurring revenue model. Proper retention strategies can increase LTV by 3-5x.

use_case: Creating partner/affiliate funnel for channel expansion
prompt:
Design a partner/affiliate program funnel that scales lead generation:

1. Partner recruitment:
   - Partner landing page and application
   - Qualification criteria
   - Onboarding process
   - Training materials

2. Partner enablement:
   - Marketing asset library
   - Swipe copy and creatives
   - Unique tracking links and codes
   - Performance dashboard

3. Commission structure:
   - Tiered commission rates
   - Performance bonuses
   - Recurring commissions
   - Payment terms and methods

4. Management system:
   - Affiliate tracking software
   - Communication cadence
   - Performance monitoring
   - Top partner recognition program

Provide partner recruitment materials, commission calculator, and program documentation. Target: 20-30% of revenue from partner channel.
description: Creates scalable channel for customer acquisition through partners. Leverages other people's audiences for growth. Can become 30-50% of customer acquisition at maturity.

use_case: Implementing AI-powered dynamic pricing in funnel
prompt:
Create a dynamic pricing strategy using AI for [product/service]:

1. Pricing intelligence:
   - Competitor price monitoring
   - Demand forecasting
   - Customer willingness to pay analysis
   - Seasonal and trend adjustments

2. Personalization:
   - User segment-based pricing
   - Behavioral pricing triggers
   - Location-based adjustments
   - Time-sensitive offers

3. Implementation:
   - AI pricing algorithm design
   - A/B testing framework
   - Price display strategies
   - Anchor pricing techniques

4. Optimization:
   - Revenue vs conversion balance
   - Price sensitivity testing
   - Psychological pricing rules ($99 vs $100)
   - Bundle and tier pricing

Provide pricing algorithm logic, implementation code, and ethical guidelines. Include profit margin and conversion rate projections.
description: Uses AI to optimize pricing for maximum revenue while maintaining conversions. Balances profit margins with conversion rates dynamically. Can increase revenue by 15-25% compared to static pricing.

use_case: Building omnichannel funnel with consistent experience
prompt:
Design an omnichannel sales funnel with seamless experience across platforms:

1. Channel strategy:
   - Website/landing pages
   - Email marketing
   - Social media (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn)
   - SMS/WhatsApp
   - In-app experiences
   - Offline touchpoints

2. Consistency framework:
   - Unified messaging and brand voice
   - Design system across channels
   - Customer data synchronization
   - Cross-channel attribution

3. Customer journey mapping:
   - Entry points for each channel
   - Cross-channel progression paths
   - Handoff optimization
   - Preference management

4. Technical integration:
   - CDP (Customer Data Platform) selection
   - API integrations
   - Unified analytics
   - Marketing automation workflows

Provide channel-specific strategies, integration architecture, and customer journey maps. Target: 30%+ higher conversion for omnichannel customers.
description: Creates seamless experience across all customer touchpoints. Omnichannel customers typically have 30% higher lifetime value. Essential for modern marketing in multi-device world.

use_case: Optimizing thank you page for post-purchase engagement
prompt:
Transform the thank you page into a revenue and engagement driver:

1. Immediate upsells:
   - One-click order bumps
   - Complementary product recommendations
   - Upgrade offers
   - Time-limited bonuses

2. Engagement mechanisms:
   - Social media follow encourages
   - Referral program introduction
   - Community/group invitations
   - Content recommendations

3. Value delivery:
   - Next steps and expectations
   - Onboarding resource links
   - Support contact information
   - Personal video message

4. Data collection:
   - Feedback and survey requests
   - Additional profile information
   - Preference center
   - Communication opt-ins

Provide thank you page templates for different offer types, upsell strategies, and implementation code. Target: 20-30% take rate on post-purchase offers.
description: Maximizes value of high-intent moment post-purchase. Most neglected but highest-converting page in funnel. Can increase average order value by 15-25% with strategic optimization.

use_case: Creating SaaS free trial funnel with activation focus
prompt:
Design a free trial funnel for [SaaS product] optimized for activation and conversion:

1. Trial signup:
   - Frictionless signup (no credit card vs credit card required)
   - Trial length optimization (7, 14, or 30 days)
   - Feature access strategy (full vs limited)
   - Onboarding questionnaire

2. Activation sequence:
   - Welcome email with quick wins
   - In-app onboarding tour
   - Time-to-value optimization
   - Success milestone tracking

3. Nurture during trial:
   - Educational email sequence
   - Feature spotlight messages
   - Use case examples
   - Success team touchpoints

4. Conversion optimization:
   - Upgrade prompts and timing
   - Trial expiration strategy
   - Discount offers for immediate upgrade
   - Post-trial follow-up sequence

Provide complete trial funnel documentation, email sequences, and in-app messaging. Target: 15-25% trial-to-paid conversion rate.
description: Optimizes SaaS trial experience for maximum activation and conversion. Focuses on demonstrating value quickly. Proper trial funnel can double conversion rates from industry averages.

use_case: Implementing account-based marketing funnel for B2B
prompt:
Create an account-based marketing (ABM) funnel for [B2B product/service]:

1. Account selection:
   - Ideal customer profile definition
   - Account scoring and prioritization
   - Stakeholder mapping within accounts
   - Research and intelligence gathering

2. Personalized engagement:
   - Account-specific landing pages
   - Personalized content and messaging
   - Multi-threaded outreach strategy
   - Executive-level engagement tactics

3. Channel orchestration:
   - LinkedIn advertising to target accounts
   - Direct mail campaigns
   - Personalized email sequences
   - Events and networking

4. Sales enablement:
   - Account insights and intelligence
   - Trigger event notifications
   - Buying committee engagement tracking
   - Handoff optimization to sales

Provide ABM playbook, personalization templates, and account journey maps. Target: 3x higher close rates vs traditional funnel.
description: Creates highly targeted funnel for specific high-value accounts. More effective than broad funnel for enterprise sales. Can reduce sales cycles by 40% and increase deal sizes significantly.

use_case: Building content marketing funnel with SEO focus
prompt:
Design a content-driven funnel optimized for organic search:

1. Content strategy:
   - Top of funnel: Informational keywords and blog posts
   - Middle of funnel: Comparison and solution content
   - Bottom of funnel: Product and buying guide content
   - Topic cluster architecture

2. SEO optimization:
   - Keyword research and mapping
   - On-page SEO elements
   - Internal linking strategy
   - Technical SEO requirements

3. Conversion optimization:
   - Content upgrades and lead magnets
   - Strategic CTA placement
   - Email capture strategies
   - Retargeting pixel implementation

4. Content promotion:
   - Initial traffic generation
   - Link building strategy
   - Social media amplification
   - Email newsletter integration

Provide content calendar, SEO checklist, and funnel mapping. Target: 50,000+ monthly organic visitors within 12 months.
description: Creates sustainable organic traffic source that feeds sales funnel. SEO content can have 10x better ROI than paid advertising. Essential for long-term, scalable growth.

use_case: Optimizing for accessibility and inclusive design
prompt:
Audit and optimize my sales funnel for accessibility and inclusion:

1. Technical accessibility:
   - WCAG 2.1 AA compliance
   - Screen reader optimization
   - Keyboard navigation
   - Color contrast requirements

2. Content accessibility:
   - Alt text for images
   - Video captions and transcripts
   - Clear and simple language
   - Semantic HTML structure

3. Form accessibility:
   - Clear labels and instructions
   - Error message clarity
   - Fieldset and legend use
   - Progressive enhancement

4. Testing and validation:
   - Automated accessibility testing tools
   - Manual testing with assistive technologies
   - User testing with disabled users
   - Ongoing monitoring and improvement

Provide accessibility audit checklist, remediation guide, and implementation code. Include legal compliance considerations (ADA, Section 508).
description: Ensures funnel is usable by people with disabilities, expanding addressable market by 15-20%. Also improves overall UX for all users. Reduces legal risk and demonstrates social responsibility.

use_case: Creating crisis/objection handling content library
prompt:
Build a comprehensive objection handling library for [product/service]:

1. Objection identification:
   - Survey existing customers and prospects
   - Analyze sales call recordings
   - Review support tickets and FAQs
   - Competitor comparison concerns

2. Response framework:
   - For each objection, create:
     * Empathy statement
     * Educational response
     * Evidence/proof points
     * Reframe/perspective shift
     * Call to action

3. Content formats:
   - FAQ page
   - Objection handling scripts
   - Email templates
   - Video responses
   - Case studies addressing specific concerns

4. Strategic placement:
   - Pre-emptive objection handling in copy
   - Chat bot responses
   - Sales enablement materials
   - Targeted content for different funnel stages

Provide complete objection library with 15-20 common objections and responses. Include testing methodology to improve over time.
description: Addresses concerns proactively to reduce friction and increase trust. Proper objection handling can increase conversions by 30-50%. Essential resource for sales team and automated touchpoints.

use_case: Implementing predictive analytics for funnel optimization
prompt:
Set up predictive analytics system to optimize [sales funnel]:

1. Data collection:
   - User behavior tracking
   - Conversion event logging
   - Feature usage monitoring
   - Customer attribute data

2. Predictive models:
   - Lead scoring (conversion probability)
   - Churn prediction
   - Lifetime value forecasting
   - Next best action recommendations

3. Activation and automation:
   - Real-time scoring and segmentation
   - Automated nurture path assignment
   - Dynamic content personalization
   - Sales alert triggers

4. Continuous improvement:
   - Model performance monitoring
   - Feedback loop implementation
   - Regular retraining schedule
   - A/B testing of predictions

Provide technical architecture, implementation guide with code samples, and KPI dashboard design. Include tool recommendations (Python, TensorFlow, cloud ML services).
description: Uses machine learning to predict outcomes and optimize funnel in real-time. Can increase conversion rates by 20-40% through better targeting. Requires data infrastructure but provides significant competitive advantage.

use_case: Designing local business funnel with geo-targeting
prompt:
Create a location-based funnel for [local business type] with multiple locations:

1. Local SEO strategy:
   - Google Business Profile optimization
   - Location-specific landing pages
   - Local keyword targeting
   - Local link building

2. Geo-targeted advertising:
   - Radius targeting for each location
   - Location-specific ad copy
   - Mobile optimization for 'near me' searches
   - Call and direction extensions

3. Conversion optimization:
   - Click-to-call prominently displayed
   - Map integration and directions
   - Local testimonials and reviews
   - Location-specific offers

4. Multi-location management:
   - Centralized tracking and reporting
   - Location-specific promotions
   - Local inventory displays
   - Franchise/multi-location best practices

Provide local funnel blueprint, location page templates, and local marketing playbook. Target: Top 3 ranking for key local searches.
description: Optimizes funnel for local search and foot traffic. Local SEO delivers 28% conversion rate (vs 1-3% for traditional). Critical for businesses with physical locations.

use_case: Creating emotional connection storytelling funnel
prompt:
Build a story-driven funnel for [brand] that creates emotional connection:

1. Brand story framework:
   - Origin story and 'why'
   - Founder journey and struggles
   - Customer transformation stories
   - Brand values and mission

2. Storytelling across funnel:
   - Awareness: Share relatable problem stories
   - Interest: Demonstrate transformation possibilities
   - Consideration: Detailed case studies and journeys
   - Decision: Personal connection and shared values
   - Loyalty: Community and belonging

3. Content formats:
   - Written narratives
   - Video testimonials and documentaries
   - Audio stories/podcasts
   - Interactive story experiences

4. Emotional triggers:
   - Identify key emotions to evoke
   - Story arcs that resonate
   - Authentic vulnerability
   - Hero's journey framework

Provide storytelling playbook, story templates, and content production guide. Include examples of emotional storytelling that drives conversions.
description: Creates deeper brand connection through narrative and emotion. Story-driven marketing can increase conversion by 30%+ and build lasting loyalty. Particularly effective for purpose-driven brands.

use_case: Implementing gamification in funnel for increased engagement
prompt:
Add gamification elements to [sales funnel] to boost engagement:

1. Gamification mechanics:
   - Points system for desired actions
   - Badges and achievements
   - Progress bars and levels
   - Leaderboards and competition
   - Rewards and unlockables

2. Application across funnel:
   - Awareness: Share and engagement points
   - Interest: Content consumption rewards
   - Consideration: Quiz and assessment games
   - Decision: Purchase incentive games (spin to win)
   - Loyalty: Repeat purchase rewards

3. Psychology:
   - Intrinsic vs extrinsic motivation
   - Variable reward schedules
   - Loss aversion mechanics
   - Social proof and competition

4. Technical implementation:
   - Platform and tool selection
   - Points tracking system
   - Reward fulfillment automation
   - Mobile app integration

Provide gamification strategy document, mechanics design, and implementation guide. Include ethical considerations and addiction prevention.
description: Uses game mechanics to increase engagement and motivation. Can boost conversion rates by 30% and improve retention significantly. Particularly effective for younger audiences and SaaS products.

use_case: Optimizing for different personality types (DISC/Myers-Briggs)
prompt:
Create personality-based funnel variations for different buyer types:

1. Personality frameworks:
   - DISC profiles (Dominant, Influential, Steady, Conscientious)
   - Myers-Briggs types
   - Customer temperaments
   - Decision-making styles

2. Funnel customization:
   - For analytical buyers:
     * Data-heavy content
     * Detailed specifications
     * Comparison charts
     * ROI calculators
   
   - For emotional buyers:
     * Story-driven content
     * Social proof emphasis
     * Visual and experiential
     * Community and belonging
   
   - For action-oriented buyers:
     * Quick decision paths
     * Clear CTAs
     * Minimal steps
     * Results-focused messaging
   
   - For relationship buyers:
     * Human connection emphasis
     * Personalized communication
     * Support availability
     * Trust-building content

3. Identification methods:
   - Quiz or assessment
   - Behavioral inference from actions
   - Survey questions
   - Purchase history analysis

4. Implementation:
   - Dynamic content switching
   - Segmented email paths
   - Personalized landing pages
   - Sales script variations

Provide personality mapping guide, content variations, and identification quiz. Target: 25%+ conversion improvement through personalization.
description: Matches funnel experience to buyer personality for maximum resonance. Addresses how different people make decisions. Sophisticated personalization that can significantly improve conversion rates.

use_case: Creating post-purchase satisfaction survey for continuous improvement
prompt:
Design a post-purchase feedback system that drives funnel optimization:

1. Survey design:
   - Net Promoter Score (NPS) question
   - Customer Satisfaction (CSAT) rating
   - Customer Effort Score (CES)
   - Open-ended feedback questions
   - Specific funnel touchpoint ratings

2. Timing and delivery:
   - Immediate post-purchase survey
   - Post-delivery/onboarding survey
   - 30-day experience survey
   - Channel selection (email, SMS, in-app)

3. Data analysis:
   - Sentiment analysis
   - Common theme identification
   - Correlation with conversion metrics
   - Detractor follow-up protocol

4. Action and optimization:
   - Feedback-driven funnel improvements
   - Quick wins implementation
   - Long-term optimization roadmap
   - Closing the loop with respondents

Provide survey templates, analysis framework, and action planning guide. Include code for automated survey delivery and analysis.
description: Creates systematic process for capturing customer feedback and using it for optimization. Identifies blind spots and improvement opportunities. Essential for continuous funnel improvement and customer-centric approach.

use_case: Building marketplace/platform two-sided funnel
prompt:
Design a two-sided funnel for [marketplace/platform] balancing supply and demand:

1. Supply side (sellers/service providers):
   - Recruitment and onboarding
   - Quality standards and vetting
   - Incentive structure
   - Success enablement

2. Demand side (buyers/users):
   - Discovery and browsing experience
   - Trust and safety mechanisms
   - Purchase/booking flow
   - Repeat usage drivers

3. Balance mechanisms:
   - Dynamic pricing and incentives
   - Supply/demand monitoring
   - Geographic expansion strategy
   - Quality control systems

4. Network effects:
   - Viral growth loops
   - Cross-side referrals
   - Value creation at scale
   - Defensibility and moats

Provide marketplace funnel architecture, chicken-and-egg solution strategies, and growth playbook. Include metrics for monitoring marketplace health.
description: Addresses unique challenges of two-sided marketplaces. Requires careful balancing of supply and demand. Successful marketplace funnels create powerful network effects and sustainable competitive advantages.

use_case: Implementing seasonal campaign funnels with urgency
prompt:
Create seasonal/holiday campaign funnel for [product/service] maximizing limited-time urgency:

1. Campaign planning:
   - Calendar of key dates (Black Friday, holidays, etc.)
   - Campaign themes and angles
   - Offer structure and discounting strategy
   - Inventory and capacity planning

2. Pre-launch sequence:
   - Teaser campaigns building anticipation
   - Early access for VIP customers
   - Waitlist and notification signup
   - Countdown and reminder sequence

3. Launch execution:
   - High-impact launch messaging
   - Multi-channel coordination
   - Real-time inventory and urgency updates
   - Deal progression (increasing urgency)

4. Post-campaign:
   - Last chance messaging
   - Non-buyer win-back attempts
   - Thank you and retention focus
   - Data analysis and lessons learned

Provide campaign calendar, email sequences, ad creative briefs, and performance tracking dashboard. Include year-round promotional calendar template.
description: Maximizes revenue during key seasonal periods. Seasonal campaigns can drive 30-50% of annual revenue for many businesses. Requires careful planning and execution across multiple channels.

use_case: Creating crisis management funnel for reputation recovery
prompt:
Design a crisis response funnel for reputation management and customer recovery:

1. Crisis identification:
   - Monitoring systems for negative sentiment
   - Trigger thresholds for activation
   - Crisis categorization (severity levels)
   - Response team and protocols

2. Immediate response:
   - Acknowledgment messaging
   - Transparency and honesty approach
   - Action plan communication
   - Channel selection and coordination

3. Recovery funnel:
   - Affected customer identification
   - Personalized outreach and compensation
   - Trust rebuilding content
   - Positive story amplification

4. Prevention systems:
   - Regular reputation monitoring
   - Proactive issue resolution
   - Customer satisfaction improvements
   - Crisis simulation and preparation

Provide crisis response playbook, message templates, and monitoring dashboard. Include case studies of successful crisis management.
description: Prepares for and responds to reputation crises that can damage funnel performance. Quick, transparent response can minimize damage and even strengthen brand. Essential insurance policy for digital businesses.

use_case: Building AI-first funnel with full automation
prompt:
Design a fully AI-automated sales funnel for [product/service] with minimal human intervention:

1. AI components:
   - Chatbot for lead qualification (24/7)
   - Predictive lead scoring and routing
   - Dynamic content personalization
   - Automated email responses
   - AI-powered recommendations
   - Smart scheduling and follow-ups

2. Human handoff points:
   - High-value opportunity thresholds
   - Complex question escalation
   - Final negotiation and closing
   - VIP customer handling

3. AI training and optimization:
   - Initial training data requirements
   - Continuous learning from interactions
   - Performance monitoring and tuning
   - Edge case handling

4. Technical architecture:
   - AI platform selection (OpenAI, Anthropic, etc.)
   - Integration with existing tools
   - Data pipeline and storage
   - Security and privacy considerations

Provide complete AI funnel architecture, implementation roadmap, and code examples. Include ROI calculations and scaling projections. Target: 80%+ automation of funnel interactions.
description: Creates cutting-edge funnel leveraging latest AI capabilities. Can handle 80%+ of interactions without human involvement while maintaining personalization. Represents future of sales funnel automation and scalability.
